metadata.title: CVE-2022-2318 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: There are use-after-free vulnerabilities caused by timer handler in net/rose/rose_timer.c of linux that allow attackers to crash linux kernel without any privileges.

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
